head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths PRIAL, FRANK J., II

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths PRIAL, FRANK J., II

block.p: PRIAL-Frank J., II. At Greenwich, CT. on October 8, 2000. Beloved husband of Marguerite Robinson Prial. Devoted father of Marguerite Petrie, Patricia Gillooly, Pamela James, Helen Snyder, Frank, Edward, Gerard, James, Michael and Joseph Prial. Dear brother of Mildred Robinson and Patricia Lowe. Also survived by eighteen grandchilren. Mass of Christian Burial 11AM Thursday, October 12th, Saint Michael's Church, 469 North St, Greenwich. Family will receive friends Wednesday 2-4 and 7-9PM at the Leo P. Gallagher & Son Funeral Home, 31 Arch St, Greenwich, CT. Burial will take place in Putnam Cemetery, Greenwich. In lieu of flowers, donations may be made to the charity of one's choice.
